findings.headline: Coinbase reports Q4 2025 earnings TODAY (Feb 12, 2026)
findings.details: Analysts have slashed price targets ahead of earnings. COIN stock down 34% YTD, dropped 6% yesterday. Concerns: weaker trading volumes, declining crypto prices, slowing stablecoin revenue, rising competition.
findings.relevance: Earnings call today could move COIN stock and impact Base ecosystem sentiment. Watch for Base-specific metrics or guidance.

findings.headline: Continued coverage of Coinbase Agentic Wallets launch
findings.details: More outlets covering the AI agent wallet infrastructure. CryptoBriefing notes this removes 'one of the biggest limitations facing AI systems today' - ability to hold/manage funds independently.
findings.relevance: Validates the agentic infrastructure trend. Good positioning for ContextKeeper.

summary: Coinbase earnings TODAY (Feb 12) is the big story. Stock under pressure (-34% YTD) ahead of results. Agentic wallets getting continued coverage but no new technical details.
action_items: Monitor Coinbase earnings call for Base-specific metrics
significance: MEDIUM-HIGH - earnings day for Coinbase, the company behind Base
